[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] 流星
having the appearance, smell, or taste of smoke 似烟的；有烟熏味的
column3: e.g. Standing on the platform, we could see the [[smoky]] outline of the farther shore.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] a long line or a series of marks that have been left by sb. / sth. 痕迹
column3: e.g. The wounded elephant left a [[trail]] of blood behind it.；e.g. A plane [[trailing]] a banner was circling overhead.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: pull sth. behind you, esp. along the ground, or be pulled in this way 拖；拉；拖在后面
column3: e.g. The wounded elephant left a [[trail]] of blood behind it.；e.g. A plane [[trailing]] a banner was circling overhead.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: like sugar 糖状的；粒状表面的
column3: e.g. Rhyolites (流纹岩) are rocks with a rather distinctive [[sugary]] texture or "feel."

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] 冬至
too special, valuable, or unusual to be replaced by anything else （因太特别、贵重或少见而）不可替代的，独一无二的
column3: e.g. The works of art that were burned in the big fire are [[irreplaceable]].

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: 1) a regular pattern of changes 规则变化；节律模式；节奏
column3: e.g. Long journeys can disrupt your body's natural [[rhythm]].；e.g. She started moving to the [[rhythm]] of the music.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: 2) a regular repeated pattern of sounds or movements 节律；节拍；节奏
column3: e.g. Long journeys can disrupt your body's natural [[rhythm]].；e.g. She started moving to the [[rhythm]] of the music.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [U] the time when it begins to get dark in the evening 黄昏；傍晚
column3: e.g. Don't worry, Michael. We'll all be back by [[nightfall]].

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] a period of time at night when people regularly work, esp. in a factory （尤其工厂的）夜班
column3: e.g. She is on the [[night shift]] this week, but on the day shift next week.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: likely to exist, happen, or be true 可能存在的；可能发生的；很可能的
column3: e.g. The [[probable]] result of global warming will be a rise in sea levels.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C, U] a decrease in the amount, size, or price of sth., or the act of decreasing sth. （数量、尺寸或价格的）减少，缩小，下降
column3: e.g. The company promised they would make no staff [[reductions]] for at least two years.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] 激素；荷尔蒙
[U] 褪黑激素（有时用作安眠药）
[C] (medical) a mental or physical illness which prevents part of your body from working properly 失调；紊乱；障碍
column3: e.g. After weeks of tests they discovered that he had a rare [[disorder]] of the lung.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [U] 糖尿病
[U] a condition in which sb. is too fat in a way that is dangerous for their health 过度肥胖
column3: e.g. [[Obesity]] can lead to heart disease and other health problems.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (of birds, animals, etc.) travel regularly from one part of the world to another （鸟、兽等）迁徙
column3: e.g. More than two million ducks [[migrate]] to the lake each fall.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C]  海龟
[C] a small animal or insect that destroys crops or food supplies （毁坏庄稼或食物的）有害小动物，害虫
column3: e.g. I hope it won't be long before we can get rid of the [[pests]] altogether.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] 推土机
damage or destroy sth. 破坏；损坏；毁坏
column3: e.g. The building had been [[wrecked]] by the explosion.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C, U] the natural home of a plant or animal （动植物的）生活环境；（动物的）栖息地
column3: e.g. These measures will protect the [[habitat]] of endangered species such as wolves.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: prevent sth. from continuing in its usual way by causing problems 扰乱；使混乱
column3: e.g. Climate change and extreme weather could seriously [[disrupt]] the agricultural economy.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] all the animals and plants in a particular area, and the way in which they are related to each other and to their environment 生态系统
column3: e.g. Many species of burrowing (掘洞的) insects are essential for maintaining a healthy soil [[ecosystem]].

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: 1) suddenly fail or become too weak to continue 突然失败；垮掉；崩溃
column3: e.g. The country's auto industry nearly [[collapsed]] due to increased foreign competition.；e.g. The roof [[collapsed]] under the weight of the snow.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: 2) fall down or fall in suddenly, often after breaking apart 倒坍；塌下
column3: e.g. The country's auto industry nearly [[collapsed]] due to increased foreign competition.；e.g. The roof [[collapsed]] under the weight of the snow.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: make a light shine on sth., or fill a place with light 照射；照亮
column3: e.g. A small path was [[illuminated]] by orange lamps concealed in the flower beds.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: 1) private and friendly so that you feel comfortable 幽静舒适的；温馨的
column3: e.g. The guests at the country club always enjoy its [[intimate]] atmosphere.；e.g. We're not on [[intimate]] terms with our neighbors.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: 2) having an extremely close friendship 亲密的；密切的
column3: e.g. The guests at the country club always enjoy its [[intimate]] atmosphere.；e.g. We're not on [[intimate]] terms with our neighbors.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C, U] hot bright burning gas that you see when sth. is on fire 火焰
column3: e.g. They sat around the campfire, watching the flickering (摇曳的) [[flames]].

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [U] the state of being completely alone, esp. when this is pleasant or relaxing 独处
column3: e.g. He spent his free time in [[solitude]], reading or walking in the hills.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: extremely useful 极有价值的
column3: e.g. His experience of teaching in overseas schools proved [[invaluable]].

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: expressing deep, usu. sad, emotions 深情的；伤感的
column3: e.g. Jeanne was a romantic, mysterious young woman with [[soulful]] blue eyes and brown skin.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: having many stars 布满星星的
column3: e.g. We had our dinner on the grassland underneath a [[starry]] sky.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: 1) [sing.] a thick covering or area of sth. 厚（的覆盖）层
column3: e.g. The valley was covered with a [[blanket]] of mist.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: 2) [C] 毯子；毛毯
column3: e.g. The valley was covered with a [[blanket]] of mist.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: become or make sth. become smaller or less （使）减小；（使）减少
column3: e.g. Her enthusiasm for knitting is by now [[diminishing]] fast.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] a building, statue, or other large structure that is built to remind people of an important event or famous person 纪念碑；纪念塔；纪念馆
column3: e.g. These are the [[monuments]] to generations of individual farmers ploughing (犁) their fields.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: in the process of becoming sth. or being made 在形成中；在生产中
column3: e.g. His book was finally published. He said that it was 10 years [[in the making]].

cabin: simply put / to put it simply
[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: used for saying that you are explaining sth. in a clear and simple way 简单地说
column3: e.g. Anyway, simply put, we still owe them a large amount of money.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: available only in small quantities, so that there is not enough 供应不足；短缺
column3: e.g. Electricity and fresh water are [[in short supply]] on the island.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C, U] (pl. salmon) 鲑鱼（肉）；三文鱼（肉）；大麻哈鱼（肉）
column3: e.g. The [[salmon]] swim upstream to spawn in late summer or fall.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] (infml.) a close friend 密友；好友
column3: e.g. Margherita and I have been [[pals]] since we were at primary school.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (always + ad. / prep.) move very quickly and lightly, like a small animal （像小动物那样）轻快地跑
column3: e.g. Shaking the snow off their hair and coats, the girls [[skittered]] up the stairs into the house.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] (esp. AmE) a wide main road that joins one town to another 公路
column3: e.g. The interstate [[highways]] are usually faster, but smaller roads can be more scenic (景色优美的).

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (only before noun) relating to a machine or toy that you turn part of several times, in order to make it move or start working （机器或玩具）装有发条的，用手柄操作的
column3: e.g. Directly in front of him were two [[windup]] monkeys, one with a guitar and the other with a drum.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (of liquid or small bits) quickly scatter through the air （液体或碎屑）飞溅，飞散
column3: e.g. The water [[sprayed]] from the hose (水龙带) and onto the grassland.；e.g. Someone had [[sprayed]] blue paint all over his car.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: force liquid out of a container so that it comes out in a stream of very small drops and covers an area 喷；喷洒
column3: e.g. The water [[sprayed]] from the hose (水龙带) and onto the grassland.；e.g. Someone had [[sprayed]] blue paint all over his car.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (always + ad. / prep.) fall or drop heavily 沉重地落下
column3: e.g. I finally got home and [[flopped]] down on the bed.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: concerning or produced by magnetism 磁的；磁性的
column3: e.g. Pigeons navigate less accurately when the Earth's [[magnetic]] field is disturbed.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (fml.) used when mentioning a fact that you wish was not true 不幸地（表示但愿并非如此）
column3: e.g. Donald, [[alas]], died last winter, even though he had shown signs of recovery for a while.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C, U] a process in which you put sth. into the group or class it belongs to 归类；分类；分级
column3: e.g. The [[classification]] of books in the library helps you find the books you want.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C, U] (pl. rainbow trout or rainbow trouts) 虹鳟
in a very beautiful and delicate way 精美地；精致地
column3: e.g. She could not take her eyes away from the [[exquisitely]] charming portrait.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: covered with rocks or made of rock 岩石覆盖的；由岩石形成的
column3: e.g. The small village sits on a [[rocky]] hill overlooking the sea.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [U] 奥米伽3（一组多元不饱和脂肪酸）
[C] a food that is needed and used all the time 基本食物；主食
column3: e.g. The aid workers are distributing corn, milk, vegetables, and other [[staples]].

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: produce eggs in large quantities at the same time （鱼或蛙）大量产卵
column3: e.g. The salmon swim upstream to [[spawn]] in late summer or fall.；e.g. New technology has [[spawned]] new business opportunities.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: make a series of things happen or start to exist 使大量出现；使大量生产；酿成
column3: e.g. The salmon swim upstream to [[spawn]] in late summer or fall.；e.g. New technology has [[spawned]] new business opportunities.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C, U] (pl. cod) 鳕鱼（肉）
(of a plan or action) have the opposite effect to the one you intended （计划或行动）发生意外，产生事与愿违的结果
column3: e.g. The company's new policy [[backfired]] when a number of employees threatened to quit.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (only before noun) in the sea or on the land near the coast 近海的；沿海的；海岸的
column3: e.g. This kind of fish is found worldwide in tropical oceans, at the edge of [[coastal]] waters and in the open sea.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: become very strong and healthy or very successful 茁壮成长；兴旺；欣欣向荣
column3: e.g. It is still unclear whether these companies will continue to [[thrive]] in the future.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [U, sing] a large quantity of sth. 充裕；丰富
column3: e.g. One quality that the team possessed in [[abundance]] was fighting spirit.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] sth. that improves your life, helps you in some way, or makes you happy 幸事；幸运；福气
column3: e.g. This modern medical equipment allows patients to live a more normal life, which is a real [[blessing]].

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C]（餐厅的）用餐者
[U] the state of containing a lot of fat 富含脂肪
column3: e.g. With much protein but little [[fattiness]], beef is the healthy food sought by many people.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: slightly wet, esp. in a way that is pleasant or suitable 潮湿的；湿润的
column3: e.g. This fruit cake will keep [[moist]] for several days if it is stored in the refrigerator.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: cook food for too long 将（食物）煮得过熟
column3: e.g. A customer complained that the vegetables were [[overcooked]].

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: cook sth., such as meat, in an oven or over a fire, or cook in this way 炙，烤（肉等）
column3: e.g. I personally would rather [[roast]] a chicken whole.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] 挪威人
[C, U] an amount of sth. that is more than what is needed or used 剩余；过剩；剩余额；多余的量
column3: e.g. This country produces more oil than it needs and sells the [[surplus]] to the rest of the world.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: include sth. as part of a group, system, plan, etc. 把 （某事物）并入，包含
column3: e.g. We've [[incorporated]] many environmentally friendly features into the design of the building.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [U] （人或动物的）肉
[U] 寿司
[C]  (pl. avocados) 鳄梨；牛油果
[U] the activity of deciding how to advertise a product, what price to charge for it, etc., or the type of job in which you do this 促销；营销；销售
column3: e.g. The reason their cars sold so well was that they had a brilliant [[marketing]] strategy.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C, usu. pl.] 抗生素
(overtook, overtaken) develop or increase more quickly than sb. / sth. else and become more successful, more important, or more advanced than them （发展或增长）超越，超过
column3: e.g. Television soon [[overtook]] the cinema as the most popular form of entertainment.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: weak or uncertain, and likely to become worse under pressure 脆弱的
column3: e.g. This area has a range of [[fragile]] ecosystems and rare plants.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] 腹部；肚子
(of animals or plants) brought or kept under control or cultivation （动物或植物）驯化的
column3: e.g. A [[domesticated]] animal, accustomed to being fed by hand, may not be able to live without man.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] a particular type of animal that is different from others but not so different that it is another species （动物的）品种
column3: e.g. What [[breed]] of dog is that? I've never seen one like it before.；e.g. Many animals [[breed]] only at certain times of the year.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (of animals) mate in order to have babies （动物）繁殖
column3: e.g. What [[breed]] of dog is that? I've never seen one like it before.；e.g. Many animals [[breed]] only at certain times of the year.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: [C] an act of driving around for enjoyment in a car, esp. one that was taken without permission and is driven in a dangerous manner 驾车兜风（尤其偷来别人汽车进行危险驾驶）
column3: e.g. A police spokesman said the incident appeared to have been a [[joyride]].

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: make use of a source of energy, knowledge, etc. that already exists 利用 , 发掘，开发（已有的能源、知识等）
column3: e.g. She hopes that additional sources of educational funding can be [[tapped into]] to help the poor children.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: dealing only with the important subject or idea, and not including any unnecessary discussions 简明恰当的；简洁中肯的
column3: e.g. Her comments on the current issues were brief and to the point.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (fml.) mostly 基本上；在很大程度上
column3: e.g. Their success was due [[in large part]] to their ability to speak Spanish.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: be suitable for being used in a particular way 适用于某事物
column3: e.g. None of his books really [[lends itself to]] being made into a film.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: save time, money, or energy by doing things quickly and not as carefully as you should （为了节约时间、金钱或精力而）马虎从事
column3: e.g. There's a temptation to [[cut corners]] when you're pushed for time, but it's not worth it.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: gradually stop using or providing sth. 逐步停止使用（提供）
column3: e.g. It is highly probable that the subsidy for car manufactures is to be [[phased out]] next year.

[C] （尤指建于林中或山上的）小木屋: (spoken) said when giving your opinion 依我看；在我看来
column3: e.g. Well, [[in my book]], if you steal, you deserve to get caught.
